turns.content: Yi Sun-sin was a Korean naval commander and admiral during the Joseon Dynasty, who is best known for his victories against the Japanese navy during the Imjin War. He is considered one of the most important figures in Korean history and is celebrated as a national hero. He created the turtle ship, the first ironclad warship in the world. He died in the Battle of Noryang on December 16, 1598.
How old was he when he died?
Yi Sun-sin died on December 16, 1598, during the Battle of Noryang. He was believed to be in his mid-50s when he died, but his exact age at the time of his death is not known.
The exact date of Yi Sun-sin's birth is not known. He was born in the late 16th century, during the Joseon Dynasty of Korea.
It seems that he was born in 1545.

Yi Sun-sin was born in 1545, and died on December 16, 1598. Therefore, he was approximately 53 years old when he passed away.
